ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Criteria_Type__c , 'No Awards'), ISNULL(No_Income_in_Last_N_months__c), !$Setup.Bypass__c.Validation__c, LOWER($Setup.Bypass__c.SObject__c) <> "all", LOWER($Setup.Bypass__c.SObject__c) <> "enrollmenteligibilitycriteria" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter value in this field.
